The Ministry of Electricity, Water and Renewable Energy / Wizarat Al-Kahraba' wal-Ma' wal-Taqah Al-Mutajaddidah <orig>وزارة الكهرباء والماء والطاقة المتجددة</orig> announces a tender for the license to operate the main building lobby of the Ministry of Electricity, Water and Renewable Energy to provide supermarket services. Those interested in participating can obtain the tender documents from the Contracts and Tenders Department – at the Ministry's main headquarters {South Surra / Janoub Al-Surra <orig>جنوب السرة</orig> – Sixth Ring Road / Al-Da'iri Al-Sadis <orig>الدائري السادس</orig> – First Floor}.
This is effective from Sunday, 20/07/2025, for a non-refundable fee of (150/-) K.D. (only one hundred and fifty Kuwaiti Dinars).
For inquiries regarding any specific information about the tender, please contact Engineer / Hassan Al-Qallaf <orig>حسن القلاف</orig> at Tel: 66840044. A preliminary meeting will be held on Tuesday, 29/07/2025, at 10:00 AM at the Administrative Services Department – Ground Floor of the Ministry. Bids must be submitted with a certificate from the Kuwait Chamber of Commerce and Industry / Ghurfat Tijara wa Sina'a Al-Kuwait <orig>غرفة تجارة وصناعة الكويت</orig> confirming the company's registration for the year (2025), to be deposited in the special bids box at the "Contracts and Tenders Department" at the Ministry's main headquarters {South Surra / Janoub Al-Surra <orig>جنوب السرة</orig> – Sixth Ring Road / Al-Da'iri Al-Sadis <orig>الدائري السادس</orig> – First Floor} by no later than 12:00 PM on Wednesday, 20/08/2025. No bids received after the specified deadline will be considered.

Announcement of a Sealed Envelope Auction, Reference (2482)
The Ministry of Finance / Wizarat Al-Maliya <orig>وزارة المالية</orig> announces the sale of office furniture - iron doors and shelves - electrical appliances - computers and their accessories - wooden beds - refrigerators and various items by sealed envelope auction at the Ministry of Health / Wizarat Al-Sihha <orig>وزارة الصحة</orig> according to the following details:
1- Location for obtaining the terms and conditions booklet and auction participation offer: Ministry of Health / Wizarat Al-Sihha <orig>وزارة الصحة</orig> – Central Archiving and Files Department – Financial Affairs, from 20/07/2025 to 24/07/2025. Documents will be handed over for a non-refundable fee of (25) K.D. via K-Net, payable to the Ministry of Health's fund.
The bidder will sign a declaration and undertaking upon receiving the terms and conditions booklet, committing to the specified deadline for submitting the offer to the Central Sales Committee at the Ministry of Finance / Wizarat Al-Maliya <orig>وزارة المالية</orig>.
2- Inspection Date: (5) working days from 20/07/2025 - 24/07/2025
Inspection Time: During official working hours
Location for receiving those interested in inspecting the auction items: Al-Jahra Health Area / Mantiqat Al-Jahra Al-Sihhiya <orig>منطقة الجهراء الصحية</orig>.
3- Bid Submission and Envelope Opening Dates:
- Bids are to be submitted on Tuesday, 29/07/2025, at the Ministry of Finance / Wizarat Al-Maliya <orig>وزارة المالية</orig> – Ministries Complex / Mujamma' Al-Wizarat <orig>مجمع الوزارات</orig> – Block 12 – Third Floor – Storage Affairs Department – Central Sales Section, according to the deadline set for the bidder by the Ministry of Health / Wizarat Al-Sihha <orig>وزارة الصحة</orig> (no bid will be accepted after the bidder's specified deadline).
- Envelope opening and auction will be held on Wednesday, 30/07/2025, at the Ministry of Finance / Wizarat Al-Maliya <orig>وزارة المالية</orig> – Ministries Complex / Mujamma' Al-Wizarat <orig>مجمع الوزارات</orig> – Block 12 – Third Floor – General Storage Affairs Department.
- The successful bidder will be announced on the Ministry of Finance's / Wizarat Al-Maliya <orig>وزارة المالية</orig> website on Wednesday, 30/07/2025.
- Checks for unsuccessful bidders will be handed over on Thursday, 31/07/2025.
- Special Auction Conditions:
1. The bidder must be Kuwaiti – an individual or a company – registered in the Commercial Register and with the Kuwait Chamber of Commerce and Industry / Ghurfat Tijara wa Sina'a Al-Kuwait <orig>غرفة تجارة وصناعة الكويت</orig> (must attach: copy of the Chamber of Commerce and Industry certificate, copy of the company license, copy of the civil ID, an authorized letter of authorization from the Chamber of Commerce and Industry, all of which must be valid).
2. Kuwaiti individuals are permitted to participate in the auction (must attach a copy of the civil ID).
To obtain the auction terms and conditions booklet: Please contact Ms. Zainab Agha <orig>زينب آغا</orig>, Tel: 24622342
Inspection site official: Please contact Ms. Khulood Khalid <orig>خلود خالد</orig>, Tel: 55044532
Central Sales Committee at the Ministry of Finance / Wizarat Al-Maliya <orig>وزارة المالية</orig> / Tel: (22481971)
Website address: www.mof.gov.kw

| 20/7/2025 | 27/7/2025 | 75 K.D. | 250 K.D. | None |
</table>

The deadline for submitting bids is Sunday, 27/7/2025, until 12:00 PM. Bids shall be submitted to the main headquarters of the Public Authority for Industry <orig>الهيئة العامة للصناعة</orig> (Second Floor - Supplies and Warehouses Department - Procurement Section) in an envelope bearing the name of the practice and the closing date, accompanied by the original or a copy of the receipt for purchasing the practice documents. Bids shall be valid for a period of (90) days from the date of opening the bid envelopes.
The bidder must submit a recent 'To Whom It May Concern' certificate issued by the Public Authority for Manpower <orig>الهيئة العامة للقوى العاملة</orig> stating that there is no suspension on the company's file regarding government contracts registered with the Public Authority for Manpower <orig>الهيئة العامة للقوى العاملة</orig>, and a 'To Whom It May Concern' certificate confirming compliance with the national labor percentage, dated contemporaneously with the bid date. The bidder must also deposit with their bid an initial deposit in the form of a certified check or an unconditional and irrevocable letter of guarantee issued in the name of the bidder by one of the accredited banks in the State of Kuwait <orig>دولة الكويت</orig> and in favor of the Public Authority for Industry <orig>الهيئة العامة للصناعة</orig> for the duration of the bid's validity. Any bid not accompanied by the full amount of this deposit will be excluded. The initial deposit may not be refunded until (90) days have passed from the closing date of the practice or when the winning bidder signs the contract, unless the practice is canceled. The Authority will not pay any interest on the amount of this deposit, and the bidder's creditors may not seize its amount, noting that this practice is indivisible.

# Public Authority for Youth <orig>الهيئة العامة للشباب</orig>
## Announcement
Regarding the issuance of Practice No. H.A.Sh./M.S./14/2025/2026
The Public Authority for Youth <orig>الهيئة العامة للشباب</orig> announces the issuance of Practice No. H.A.Sh./M.S./14/2025/2026 for providing labor, internal and external cleaning services, transportation, and waste disposal for the Authority's headquarters, youth centers, and scout camps, according to the following data:

<table>

|:---|:---|:---|:---|
| 20/07/2025 | 10/08/2025 | 75 Kuwaiti Dinars | 2% |

Companies and institutions wishing to participate in this practice can purchase and obtain the practice documents by accessing the website of the Public Authority for Youth <orig>الهيئة العامة للشباب</orig> (https://www.youth.gov.kw) for the specified fee. Bid envelopes shall be received by the Tenders, Contracts, and Investment Section in the Financial Affairs Control (First Floor) - located at Jaber Al-Ahmad Youth Center <orig>مركز شباب جابر الأحمد</orig> in Jaber Al-Ahmad Area <orig>منطقة جابر الأحمد</orig> - Plot (7) - (N3) - Street 60, during official working hours.
Please note that a preliminary meeting for bidders was held at Jaber Al-Ahmad Youth Center <orig>مركز شباب جابر الأحمد</orig>, affiliated with the Public Authority for Youth <orig>الهيئة العامة للشباب</orig>, at 11:00 AM on Sunday, 27/07/2025.
Bids must be submitted from 9:00 AM until 1:00 PM on the closing date. Bids shall be delivered inside designated envelopes, sealed with red wax, and placed in the box designated for practices in the Tenders, Contracts, and Investment Section of the Financial Affairs Control at Jaber Al-Ahmad Youth Center <orig>مركز شباب جابر الأحمد</orig>, affiliated with the Public Authority for Youth <orig>الهيئة العامة للشباب</orig>.
The bidder is also obligated to ensure that the bid is valid for a period of (90) ninety days from the closing date, accompanied by the original or a copy of the receipt for purchasing the practice documents. Any bid not accompanied by the original initial guarantee, a valid national labor support certificate issued by the Ministry of Social Affairs <orig>وزارة الشؤون الاجتماعية</orig>, and a clearance certificate issued by the Public Authority for Manpower <orig>الهيئة العامة للقوى العاملة</orig> within its contents, stating that there are no suspension codes related to the labor registered for its file with the Authority, and attaching a certificate of payment of the institution's social insurance contributions, will be excluded.
This announcement serves as an invitation to bidders wishing to attend the bid opening session at the Public Authority for Youth <orig>الهيئة العامة للشباب</orig> on Sunday, 10/08/2025, at 2:30 PM.
Acting Director General <orig>مدير عام</orig> of the Public Authority for Youth <orig>الهيئة العامة للشباب</orig>

- Bids must be submitted at the headquarters of the General Services Department, located at the Public Authority for Manpower <orig>الهيئة العامة للقوى العاملة</orig> headquarters, Building No. 2, Street 106. No bid received after this deadline will be considered. A purchase authorization letter, a copy of the civil ID, and company documents must be presented.
- The aforementioned cash payment must be made via K-Net card.
- The final time for bid submission is 1:30 PM on the day specified above. A bid submission authorization and a copy of the civil ID must be presented.
- A national labor percentage certificate, valid for one year from the date of bid submission, must be provided.
- Applicants for the practice must review the practice documents and submit all questions and inquiries related to the practice in writing during the preliminary meeting and before any subsequent inquiry. In the event that any applicant fails to attend the practice, they shall be bound by all agreed-upon terms during the preliminary meeting without having the right to claim any material demands or additional time periods from the Public Authority for Manpower <orig>الهيئة العامة للقوى العاملة</orig>.
- Attendance at the preliminary meeting requires the presentation of the following:
  1. The original purchase receipt.
  2. An authorization to attend and a copy of the civil ID of the authorized person.
- Bid envelopes will be opened on Sunday, 03/08/2025, at 1:30 PM, at the location specified in the practice documents, in a public session attended by bidders or their representatives.
- The practice is indivisible, does not accept alternative offers, and follows a single-envelope system (technical and financial).
- Bids shall be valid for 90 days from the closing date. The initial guarantee is (525) K.D. and must be valid throughout the bid's validity period in the name of the Public Authority for Manpower <orig>الهيئة العامة للقوى العاملة</orig>.
- This announcement is considered an integral part of the practice documents.
- For more information, please visit the Public Authority for Manpower <orig>الهيئة العامة للقوى العاملة</orig> website on the World Wide Web.

The Capital Markets Authority <orig>هيئة أسواق المال</orig> announces that a license has been issued for the Al-Luluah <orig>اللؤلؤة</orig> US Dollar Money Market Fund, in accordance with the provisions of Islamic Sharia, on 15/07/2025, for a period of three years, renewable.

## Kuwait Authority for Partnership Projects <orig>هيئة مشروعات الشراكة بين القطاعين العام والخاص</orig>

# Announcement

Regarding Practice No. (2) for the year 2023/2024 concerning the provision of consulting services for the project of building and operating the Vehicle Auction Market, based on Tenders Law No. (49) of 2016 and its executive regulations issued by Decree No. (30) of 2017.
With reference to the Authority's announcement in Al-Kuwait Al-Youm <orig>الكويت اليوم</orig> newspaper, Issue No. (1715) dated 01/12/2025, regarding the offering of Practice No. (2) for the year 2023/2024 concerning the provision of consulting services for the project of building and operating the Vehicle Auction Market, the Kuwait Authority for Partnership Projects <orig>هيئة مشروعات الشراكة بين القطاعين العام والخاص</orig>, in cooperation with the Ministry of Commerce and Industry <orig>وزارة التجارة والصناعة</orig>, announces the award of the aforementioned practice to a consortium led by Dar Al-Khaleej Engineering Consultants Company <orig>شركة دار الخليج للاستشارات الهندسية</orig>, with consortium members KMG Consulting LLC <orig>شركة كي إم جي للاستشارات ذ.م.م</orig> and Al-Hamad Legal Group <orig>مجموعة الحمد القانونية</orig>.

# Announcement of Extension for Request for Qualification for Al Dibdibah <orig>الدبدبة</orig> Power Generation Project and Al Shagaya <orig>الشقايا</orig> Renewable Energy Project – Phase III

## Project Two – PV Zone 2

The Kuwait Authority for Partnership Projects <orig>هيئة مشروعات الشراكة بين القطاعين العام والخاص</orig>, in cooperation with the Ministry of Electricity, Water and Renewable Energy <orig>وزارة الكهرباء والماء والطاقة المتجددة</orig>, invited companies/consortia wishing to submit a Request for Qualification to participate in a tender for the design, financing, construction, operation, maintenance, and financing of the Al Dibdibah <orig>الدبدبة</orig> Power Generation Project and Al Shagaya <orig>الشقايا</orig> Renewable Energy Project – Phase III – Project Two – PV Zone 2, which is a renewable energy production plant with a net capacity of 500 MW of power (the "Project"), in the Official Gazette – Al-Kuwait Al-Youm <orig>الكويت اليوم</orig> – Issue No. 1739, Seventy-First Year, dated May 18, 2025.
Through the offering of this Project, the Kuwait Authority for Partnership Projects <orig>هيئة مشروعات الشراكة بين القطاعين العام والخاص</orig> and the Ministry of Electricity, Water and Renewable Energy <orig>وزارة الكهرباء والماء والطاقة المتجددة</orig> aim to achieve the following objectives:
- Attracting private sector expertise in the field of renewable energy.
- Reducing the financial and operational burden on the Ministry of Electricity, Water and Renewable Energy <orig>وزارة الكهرباء والماء والطاقة المتجددة</orig>.
- Reducing local reliance on fuel.
- Lowering the total costs borne by the State of Kuwait for providing power generation.
- Increasing renewable energy capacity within the national energy mix.

Based on requests to extend the deadline for purchasing qualification documents and submitting qualification applications from several companies/consortia, the Kuwait Authority for Partnership Projects <orig>هيئة مشروعات الشراكة بين القطاعين العام والخاص</orig> announces the extension of the deadline for purchasing qualification documents and submitting qualification applications through the platform provided by the Kuwait Authority for Partnership Projects <orig>هيئة مشروعات الشراكة بين القطاعين العام والخاص</orig>, with a new deadline no later than 12:00 PM (Kuwait Time) on August 21, 2025. (Please refer to all details in the announcement mentioned above.) For inquiries, please contact via email: Alshagaya2@kapp.gov.kw
This invitation does not obligate the Kuwait Authority for Partnership Projects <orig>هيئة مشروعات الشراكة بين القطاعين العام والخاص</orig> whatsoever to proceed to the next stage or award the tender. The Kuwait Authority for Partnership Projects <orig>هيئة مشروعات الشراكة بين القطاعين العام والخاص</orig> reserves the full right to terminate the tender, re-initiate the stage with modifications, or continue with the project in another manner at any time without any liability whatsoever.
This announcement is considered an integral part of the aforementioned announcement and the project documents, and is complementary and supplementary to them.

## Announcement for Extension of Request for Qualification for Al Dibdibah Power and Al Shagaya Renewable Energy – Phase III Zone 2 Solar PV

The Kuwait Authority for Partnership Projects, in collaboration with the Ministry of Electricity & Water & Renewable Energy of the State of Kuwait, has invited companies/consortia in the Official Gazette – Kuwait Alyawm – issue no.1739 on May 18, 2025 to participate in a tender for the design, financing, construction, operation, maintenance and transfer of the Al Dibdibah Power and Al Shagaya Renewable Energy – Phase III – Zone 2 Solar PV IPP, a renewable power plant with a net capacity of 500 MW of power (the “Project”).
With the launch of the procurement for this Project, KAPP and MEWRE aim to achieve the following objectives:
- Further introduce private sector practices and capital to sectors traditionally under the control of the public sector;
- Reduce the financial and operational burden from MEWRE;
- Decrease domestic reliance on fossil fuels;
- Reduce overall costs to the State of Kuwait for provision of power generation;
- Increase RE capacity within the national energy mix.
Based on requests to extend the RFQ purchase and SOQ submission deadline from several companies/consortia, the Kuwait Authority for Partnership Projects is pleased to announce the extension of the RFQ purchase and SOQ submission deadline through the same platform made available by KAPP no later than 12:00 pm (Kuwait Time) on 21 August 2025. (Please refer to all the details in the announcement mentioned above.)
In case of any queries, please contact: Alshagaya2@kapp.gov.kw
This announcement shall not commit, nor bind KAPP whatsoever in having to proceed to the next stage or award

## Announcement 2025/76
Regarding the offering of Tender No. 2026/2025/12 for the operation of a restaurant in the Heavy Vehicle Complex in Al-Shuwaikh <orig>الشويخ</orig> area

Kuwait Municipality <orig>بلدية الكويت</orig> announces the offering of Tender No. 2026/2025/12 for the operation of a restaurant in the Heavy Vehicle Complex in Al-Shuwaikh <orig>الشويخ</orig> area (the site previously occupied by the Kuwait Municipality Employees Union <orig>نقابة العاملين ببلدية الكويت</orig>).
Specialized companies wishing to participate in this tender, which are capable of providing all necessary requirements to perform the requested service at the best possible level, including goods and services specific to this license, in terms of external appearance (clothing and cleanliness of workers), arrangement, organization, cleanliness, and quality of food items provided, should review Kuwait Municipality <orig>بلدية الكويت</orig> (Administrative Building - 7th Floor - Tenders and Auctions Control <orig>مراقبة المناقصات والمزايدات</orig>) during official working hours to obtain the tender documents for a fee of K.D. 200/- (Two Hundred Kuwaiti Dinars only). This amount is non-refundable under any circumstances. Owners of small and medium-sized enterprises <orig>المشروعات الصغيرة والمتوسطة</orig> approved by the National Fund for Small and Medium Enterprise Development <orig>الصندوق الوطني لرعاية وتنمية المشروعات الصغيرة والمتوسطة</orig> are exempt from these fees.
The bidder must inspect the service performance site with a thorough inspection that negates ignorance before the date of the preliminary meeting, to enable bidders to raise their inquiries in the preliminary meeting to achieve the principle of transparency.
The preliminary meeting with bidders who have obtained the tender documents will be held at 10:00 AM on Tuesday, 5/8/2025, at the Kuwait Municipality <orig>بلدية الكويت</orig> branch building in the Capital Governorate <orig>محافظة العاصمة</orig>.
All companies submitting bids in the tender must send a representative to attend the public session for opening the bid envelopes submitted in the tender, scheduled for Monday, 11/8/2025. Please note that in case of non-compliance with attendance, Kuwait Municipality <orig>بلدية الكويت</orig> bears no responsibility for that.
Bids must be submitted in sealed envelopes, stamped with red wax, with the tender number and subject written on them. The name of the bidder or anything indicating it should not be written on the envelope. Bids must be placed in the designated box located at Kuwait Municipality <orig>بلدية الكويت</orig> (Administrative Building - 7th Floor - Tenders and Auctions Control <orig>مراقبة المناقصات والمزايدات</orig>) no later than 12:00 PM on Monday, 11/8/2025, which is the final deadline for accepting bids. An initial security deposit of no less than (2%) and no more than (5%) of the bid value must be submitted with the bid.
If you wish to review Kuwait Municipality <orig>بلدية الكويت</orig>, please make an appointment by accessing the link
www.baladia.gov.kw

Based on Article (19) of Municipality Resolution No. (2009/161) regarding the classification, licensing, and registration of building and demolition contractors in Kuwait Municipality <orig>بلدية الكويت</orig>, which stipulates that a contractor may submit a request to the Municipality <orig>البلدية</orig> to cancel their registration before its expiry or to cancel the classification. The committee stipulated in Article One of this regulation may issue its decision to that effect after fulfilling the following two conditions:
- 1- The contractor has completed all contracted works.
- 2- The lapse of fifteen (15) days from the date of publishing this request in the Official Gazette <orig>الجريدة الرسمية</orig>.

The cancellation of the license or registration shall result in the refund of the bank guarantee submitted by the contractor, taking into account the last paragraph of Article (10) of this resolution.

Accordingly, the Municipality <orig>البلدية</orig> appeals to anyone who has any claims against the aforementioned contractor regarding construction contracts concluded between them that have not yet been completed, or judicial reservations for their interests due to violating contracting works or dues arising from the contracting agreement, to review the Contractors Department <orig>قسم المقاولين</orig> at the Engineering Systems Department <orig>إدارة الأنظمة الهندسية</orig> within a maximum period of fifteen days from this date. The Municipality <orig>البلدية</orig> will not consider any claims submitted after the prescribed period.

Director General of the Municipality <orig>مدير عام البلدية</orig>

# General Presidency of the National Guard <orig>الرئاسة العامة للحرس الوطني</orig>
## Announcement of Tender No. (03-2025/2026)
### Development of Military Databases Using Artificial Intelligence and Communication Lines Development

The Committee for Military Material Procurement and Military Facilities Contracts <orig>لجنة شئون مشتريات المواد العسكرية ومقاولات المنشآت العسكرية</orig> at the National Guard <orig>الحرس الوطني</orig> announces the tender for the development of military databases using artificial intelligence and communication lines development, for specialized companies and institutions in accordance with the general and special conditions stated in the tender documents.
Therefore, participating companies and institutions must register on the General Presidency of the National Guard <orig>الرئاسة العامة للحرس الوطني</orig> website (www.kng.gov.kw) to purchase the tender documents for a non-refundable fee of (3,500 K.D.) three thousand five hundred Kuwaiti Dinars only, payable through the National Guard <orig>الحرس الوطني</orig> website using the (K-NET) service.
A site visit will be conducted at the General Presidency of the National Guard <orig>الرئاسة العامة للحرس الوطني</orig> camp on Monday, (2025/08/04) at 9:00 AM, for prior coordination and obtaining necessary permits. Please contact (Mr. Hamoud Saad <orig>حمود سعد</orig>) (66710738).
Furthermore, a preliminary meeting will be held at 10:00 AM on Thursday, (2025/08/07) at the General Presidency of the National Guard <orig>الرئاسة العامة للحرس الوطني</orig>, Colonel Staff / Faisal Al-Juraid <orig>فيصل الجريد</orig> Building. Attendance or non-attendance of this meeting will be binding with all decisions, recommendations, or clarifications contained therein. Participating companies and institutions must also bring the minutes of the preliminary meeting from the National Guard <orig>الحرس الوطني</orig> website (www.kng.gov.kw). Please note that the deadline for submitting bids is 1:00 PM on Thursday, (2025/08/21).
Note: Companies and institutions wishing to purchase tender documents must provide us with a copy of the purchase receipt, and companies classified as small and medium enterprises must provide a certificate proving this. For any inquiries, please call the switchboard at (24999999) extension (66787-66735), fax (24999858).

# Kuwait Oil Tanker Company <orig>شركة ناقلات النفط الكويتية</orig>
## Announcement
Regarding the extension of the closing date for the practice related to the comprehensive contract for the dry-docking and maintenance of (6) tankers
Reference No.: FEG-01/2025
Kuwait Oil Tanker Company <orig>شركة ناقلات النفط الكويتية</orig>, a subsidiary of Kuwait Petroleum Corporation <orig>مؤسسة البترول الكويتية</orig>, announces the extension of the closing date to 1:00 PM on Tuesday, 5/8/2025, instead of Tuesday, 22/7/2025. Bids (as detailed in the practice documents) shall be deposited in Tender Box (B) – designated for this purpose and located at Kuwait Oil Tanker Company <orig>شركة ناقلات النفط الكويتية</orig> – Shuwaikh Administrative <orig>الشويخ الإدارية</orig> – Ground Floor, in addition to submitting bids through the electronic system KPC & Subsidiaries K-Tendering Portal (ktendering.com.kw). The validity of the bids shall be for a period of (90) days starting from the aforementioned closing date.

# Kuwait Airways <orig>الخطوط الجوية الكويتية</orig>
## Announcement of an Auction
For the sale of used furniture + used household electronic devices No. (003/2025)
Kuwait Airways <orig>الخطوط الجوية الكويتية</orig> announces its desire to conduct an auction for used furniture + used household electronic devices according to the following conditions:
- Those wishing to participate in the auction must pay a security deposit of (K.D. 150) only one hundred and fifty Kuwaiti Dinars <orig>دينار كويتي</orig> as an auction entry deposit on 24/7/2025 (refundable after the auction concludes).
- The deposit amount shall be paid at the cashier's office located in the Finance Department, Ground Floor, at the main building of Kuwait Airways <orig>الخطوط الجوية الكويتية</orig> in Dajeej <orig>الضجيج</orig> area, along with providing us with a copy of civil IDs to obtain the necessary security permits for auction entry.
- Bringing the original payment receipt is a condition for participating in the auction.
- In case the winner withdraws after their bid is accepted and the auction concludes, they are not entitled to claim the security deposit.
- In case the winner withdraws after their bid is accepted, they must submit a withdrawal declaration to the Assets Valuation and Sale Committee <orig>لجنة تقييم وبيع الأصول</orig>; otherwise, they will be prevented from participating in future auctions.
- The auction shall be attended in person by those wishing to purchase.
- Bids shall be submitted in a sealed envelope to Mr./Secretary of the Assets Valuation and Sale Committee <orig>أمين سر لجنة تقييم وبيع الأصول</orig> immediately after the inspection concludes.
- The successful bidder, upon acceptance of their bid, must pay the full bid amount at the cashier's section in the Finance Department, Ground Floor, located at the main building of Kuwait Airways <orig>الخطوط الجوية الكويتية</orig> in Dajeej <orig>الضجيج</orig> area.
- The original copy of the payment receipt shall be handed to Mr./Secretary of the Assets Valuation and Sale Committee <orig>أمين سر لجنة تقييم وبيع الأصول</orig> to obtain the security permits for receiving and transporting scrap materials.
- The successful bidder shall bear the costs of transporting and receiving scrap materials and cleaning the site.
- The buyer is obligated to remove the materials from the site within a period not exceeding (20) days from the date of paying the bid amount; otherwise, the auction will be withdrawn from them with a deduction of (20%) of the bid amount.
